content: try out this crochet gummy bear pattern link to youtube video https //youtu be/rt6srnwomec skill level easy format pdf and video stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet inv decrease invisible decrease bobble bobble stitch tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium -any colour -yarn needle -scissors -stuffing -stitch marker final size - height of 8 cm and width of 3 cm
